      • addTicket

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1/addTicket",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String addTicket(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String userId,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String fromId,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String toId,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String carrierId,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            int flightId,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String fClass,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String fType,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String departureDate,
                                                                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String returnDate)
                                                                                                                     throws java.text.ParseException
        Adds ticket to database introduced by user
        Parameters:
        userId - id of authored user logged in by Auth0
        email - user email
        fromId - id of airport user departure
        toId - id of airport user arrive
        carrierId - id of carrier
        flightId - unique flight id
        fClass - flight class {Economy,Premium Economy, Business, First}
        fType - flight type {roundTrip,oneWay}
        departureDate - date of departure
        returnDate - if flight type is roundTrip, it is date of return flight
        Returns:
        String with updated user metadata
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if DataFormat is not supported
